title: Calories in a Small Avocado
meta_description: Discover calories in small avocado, including healthy fats, fiber, protein, and full nutrition breakdown per serving with quick tweaks and FAQs.
assumptions: Small avocado (~100 g edible flesh, pitted and skinned); raw, ripe Hass variety.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by variety, ripeness, growing conditions, and portion accuracy. Check labels or apps for specifics.

quick_answer.text: A small avocado provides ~160 kcal, mostly from healthy monounsaturated fats, with 7 g fiber.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tbsp lime juice and salt for seasoning

faqs.q: How many calories in small avocado?
faqs.a: Approximately 160 kcal for the edible flesh of one small avocado.

faqs.q: Is a small avocado low carb?
faqs.a: Yes, about 8.5 g total carbs, but 6.7 g is fiber, so net carbs are low at ~1.8 g.

faqs.q: What makes avocado high in fat?
faqs.a: Mostly healthy monounsaturated fats (about 10 g per small avocado), good for heart health.

faqs.q: Calories in small vs medium avocado?
faqs.a: Small (~100 g) has 160 kcal; medium (~136 g) has about 218 kcal.

faqs.q: Does cooking change calories in avocado?
faqs.a: Minimal change if grilled or baked; added oils or ingredients increase calories.
